page.title: 04 The Common
page.content: The Common is a big place on the outside of town. The two main roads which take you there are The Avenue and Hill Lane. There are three lakes on the Common. The boating lake is manmade but the fishing lake and the bird lake are natural. The bird lake has lots of different birds. The paddling pool is near the boating lake. The pool is emptied in the winter and filled in the summer so that children can play in it. By the side of the pool there is a play area. Also there is a small bike road. The fair comes on the Easter and August bank holidays. In July the Southampton Show comes to the Common and they have displays, craft exhibits and school entries. There was also a zoo but it is closed now.
